Posts.Content: Oct 20, 2012 11:03AM suzqg wrote: All I was diagnosed with BC in L on 9.27.12 and on 10.4.12 diagnosed R breast too. I had double Mastectomy on 10.12.12. The surgery is hard, but nothing you can't get through after the fear during testing-not to mention poking and prodding! Please b sure to find a woman's boutique to get your post surgery br-U have never been so happy to have a bra until this past Tuesday!!! I have to agree once then plan is made and YOU are comfortable and knowledgeable with the plan it is Much easier! The world around me has opened up-so much support and love I never realized existed! Please stay on here-it is a god send! We're all in this together!!!
Posts.Title: I was just diagnosed this past week, matilov47 Everyday-a-Hollyday

Posts.Content: suzqg wrote: I am recovering from double mastectomy. I have been diagnosed with intra ductal and infiltrating carcinoma. My pain post surgery is very painful-aches, burning, make a me nauseated, do any of You have a timeline until this debilitating pain subsides.? Also would like to share treatment plans amongst each other. Dx 9/27/2012, DCIS, ER-/PR-, HER2- Dx 9/27/2012, IDC, ER-/PR-, HER2- Dx 10/4/2012, DCIS, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 10/12/2012 Mastectomy: Left, Right Log in to post a reply
